name: Retail Game
description:
In this game, the player is able to interact with several different kinds of customers in order to run a store. Customer types include normal customers, recurring customers, and even shoplifters or robbers! Can you make it through your shift with your earnings intact? Play to find out.

[More in Depth]

Most customers can be dealt with by simply clicking an item, verifying the checkout is correct (hovering a magnifying glass or black light over an id or money respectively) and then "bagging" the item.

Some customer, the recurring ones, also have an additional branch dialogue for the player to click on and interact with. This may lead to a deeper understanding of the world!

Shoplifters and Robbers must be dealt with by force. Once they appear, the player has the option to go to the parking lot and enter a shootout. Shoplifters will simply disappear after some time. Robbers will shoot at the player in the parking lot and may even injure you! However, if you comply with the robbers wishes and not go into the parking lot, you can get away with your life intact.
